name: Juanito Arcade Mayhem
description: Juanito Arcade Mayhem is the arcade-hopping adventure. Teleport into different video games, play with unique mechanics inspired by well-known arcade games, face stunningly animated bosses and join the fight against the clonocell invasion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core2 duo / AMD A4-3300M APU 1.90GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Card with 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 10
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel or AMD multicore processor from recent years Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Card with 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 10
